footer.email_list: Sign up for our e-mail list, the Neon Law Monthly.
footer.delete_your_data.heading: Delete Your Data
footer.delete_your_data.text:
Delete Your Data is a service provided by Neon Law or an affiliate
attorney limited in scope to doing data deletions on your behalf. All
content presented herein is for informational purposes only. Nothing
should be construed as legal advice. Transmission and receipt of this
information is not intended to create and does not constitute, an
attorney-client relationship with lawyers on this platform. There is no
expectation of attorney-client privilege or confidentiality of anything
you may communicate to us in this forum. Do not act upon any
information presented without seeking professional counsel.
footer.bar_prep: Taking the bar? <u>Check out our free study guide</u>.
footer.justice_for_rickie_slaughter.head: Justice For Rickie
footer.justice_for_rickie_slaughter.text:
Please sign Rickie's Change.org petition, send him a free letter, and
share this website to raise awareness about his wrongful conviction. We at
Neon Law sincerely thank you for checking out this website.
footer.neon_law.heading: Neon Law
footer.neon_law.text:
All content presented herein is for informational purposes only.
Nothing should be construed as legal advice. Transmission and receipt
of this information is not intended to create and does not constitute,
an attorney-client relationship with lawyers on this platform. There is
no expectation of attorney-client privilege or confidentiality of
anything you may communicate to us in this forum. Do not act upon any
information presented without seeking professional counsel.
languageDropdown.text: Currently viewing this site in English
beginUpwardMQ.heading: Upward Mobility Questionnaire
beginUpwardMQ.text:
Thanks for expressing your interest in Neon Law and our commitment to
Upward Mobility. Please note that taking this questionnaire does not
constitute an attorney-client relationship. An attorney-client
relationship only exists if you have a signed retainer with our firm.
Please contact us if you are interested in attaining our services.
finishUpwardMQ.heading: Thank You for Taking the Upward Mobility Questionnaire
finishUpwardMQ.text: You have completed the questionnaire. Your answers are:
upwardMQ.missing_question: A question is missing from the questionnaire. Please contact support.

pages_admin.heading: Admin Portal
pages_lawyers.heading: Lawyer Portal
pages_portal.heading: Your Legal Matters
pages_portal.text: You currently do not have any active matters with our firm or our network. Contact us if you are interested in retaining our services.
pages_pb.heading: Contact Rickie Slaughter
pages_pb.text1: You can send a letter to Rickie at Rickie Slaughter NV #85902 1250 E Arica Road Eloy, AZ 85131
pages_pb.text2: Or, if you fill out your info below, we will mail out a letter on your behalf.
pages_upward_mobility.heading: Upward Mobility
pages_upward_mobility.text: Upward mobility refers to the come up, or improving your socio-economic situation to a point where you can provide for others. No matter where you are today, we can help you take care of those you love.
banner.title: Accurate Affordable Attorneys
banner.text: We are on a mission to improve access to justice with low-cost, top-quality legal representation and free legal resources available here. When anyone can afford to use the law, everyone wins.
banner.signin: Sign in to access your portal
why_neon_law.heading: Why Neon Law?
why_neon_law.sub_text: We employ justice-based tech to deliver efficient, accurate results.
why_neon_law.good_people.title: We only represent Good People
why_neon_law.good_people.text: We do not represent shady people and have fired clients after discovering they're racist, transphobic, sexist, or otherwise bad people.
why_neon_law.good_causes.title: We only represent Good Causes
why_neon_law.good_causes.text: We do not represent fossil fuel companies, predatory landlords or creditors, or companies that maliciously use your personal data.
why_neon_law.tech-to-make-affordable.tit:
We use technology to make Legal Services
Affordable
why_neon_law.tech-to-make-affordable.tex: We leverage document automation, natural language processing, and our own open-source software to deliver cost-effective legal services.

pro_bono.p1: Finally, and most importantly, we are proudest of our commitment to
pro_bono.p2: work and wish we could do it full time. If you require assistance and have attained a SOLA from either

get_started.title: Ready to Get Started
get_started.sub_text:
Please reach out if you need help or have any questions. We are happy to
help you out with our services with providing legal solutions to make
your life better.
